turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you help me order a coffee for pick up from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of coffee would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm wanting a nitro cold brew with sweet cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, give me one moment to order that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want it in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I want that in a grande. Is it possible to get blonde coffee with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i check.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, confirming your order of grande nitro brewed blonde coffee with sweet cream is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I need that picked up in Austin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what is your closest store and ill send your order there.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I think the closest store I'm in Killeen at the moment, so we're going to go with Stan Schleuter Drive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say stanschluter drive?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, ill send your order there, it will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Excellent.Thank you. Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it for today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
